languages.text: "Вопиющее происшествие. Я немедленно отдам приказ об изменении порядка проверок личного состава. Все, кто вызовет хоть малейшие подозрения, отправятся под стражу!"
"That is an outrage. I will have the personnel vetting procedure changed immediately. The slightest suspicion will be grounds for arrest!"
languages.original_text: "Вопиющее происшествие. Я немедленно отдам приказ об изменении порядка проверок личного состава. Все, кто вызовет хоть малейшие подозрения, отправятся под стражу!"

traits.locale_text: "That's an outrage. I will immediately give the order to change the procedure for personnel background checks. The slightest suspicion will be grounds for arrest!"
"That's an outrage. I will immediately give the order to change the procedure for personnel background checks. The slightest suspicion will be grounds for arrest!"
"That's an outrage. I will immediately order to change the procedure for personnel background checks. A slightest suspicion will be grounds for arrest!"
"That's an outrage. I will immediately order to change the procedure for personnel background checks. A slightest suspicion will be grounds for arrest!"
"That is an outrage. I will have the personnel vetting procedure changed immediately. The slightest suspicion will be grounds for arrest!"
"That is an outrage. I will have the personnel vetting procedure changed immediately. The slightest suspicion will be grounds for arrest!"

languages.text: "Das ist ungeheuerlich! Ich werde sofort anordnen, das Verfahren für die Überprüfung von Personal abzuändern. Selbst der kleinste Verdacht reicht ab sofort für eine Verhaftung aus!"
languages.original_text: "That is an outrage. I will have the personnel vetting procedure changed immediately. The slightest suspicion will be grounds for arrest!"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist ein Skandal. Ich werde sofort anordnen, das Verfahren für die Überprüfung von Personal abzuändern. Selbst der kleinste Verdacht reicht ab sofort für eine Verhaftung aus!"

languages.text: « C'est un scandale. Je vais immédiatement donner l'ordre de modifier la procédure pour vérifier les antécédents du personnel. Au moindre doute, ce sera l'arrestation ! »
languages.original_text: "That is an outrage. I will have the personnel vetting procedure changed immediately. The slightest suspicion will be grounds for arrest!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est un scandale. Je vais immédiatement donner l'ordre de modifier la procédure pour vérifier les antécédents du personnel. Au moindre doute, ce sera l'arrestation ! »

languages.text: “这简直让人震怒不已。我准备立刻下令更改人员审查程序，只要是有一丁点嫌疑，就要立刻逮捕！”
languages.original_text: "That is an outrage. I will have the personnel vetting procedure changed immediately. The slightest suspicion will be grounds for arrest!"

traits.locale_text: “这实在是让人震怒不已。我会立刻下令启动调查程序，只要看到可疑的人就立刻逮捕！”

languages.text: 「なんということだ。ただちに個人の審査手順を変更するよう命じる。少しでも疑いがあれば逮捕する！」
languages.original_text: "That is an outrage. I will have the personnel vetting procedure changed immediately. The slightest suspicion will be grounds for arrest!"

traits.locale_text: 「なんということだ。ただちに個人の審査手順を変更するよう命じる。少しでも疑いがあれば逮捕する！」

languages.text: «Es un ultraje. Ordenaré inmediatamente que se modifique el procedimiento de comprobación de antecedentes del personal. ¡La más mínima sospecha será motivo de arresto!».
languages.original_text: "That is an outrage. I will have the personnel vetting procedure changed immediately. The slightest suspicion will be grounds for arrest!"

traits.locale_text: «Es una barbaridad. Ordenaré inmediatamente que se modifique el procedimiento de comprobación de antecedentes del personal. La más mínima sospecha será motivo de arresto».

languages.text: "Büyük rezalet. Personel güvenlik soruşturması prosedürünü derhâl değiştirteceğim. En ufak bir şüphe, tutuklanma sebebi sayılacak!"
languages.original_text: "That is an outrage. I will have the personnel vetting procedure changed immediately. The slightest suspicion will be grounds for arrest!"

traits.locale_text: "Büyük rezalet. Personel güvenlik soruşturması prosedürünü derhâl değiştirteceğim. En ufak bir şüphe, tutuklanma sebebi sayılacak!"
